commentBody: When are we going to get police action on this issue? Why do we continue to believe law enforcement departments who say claim they don't have the time, or the jurisdiction, or the technological know-how? Funnily enough, a threat against a head of state or police station gets investigated immediately, but specific and repeated rape or death threats against a woman? Oh, that's just "an angry geek" and the recipient should "get a thicker skin."
